block_comment: This block copies the pre-calculated values of 'reset_out' and 'reset_req'. It is executed whenever any input signals change, due to the sensitivity list (@*). 'reset_out' and 'reset_req' are updated with the values of 'reset_out_pre' and 'reset_req_pre' respectively. This transfer of values ensures that 'reset_out' and 'reset_req' always have the most updated pre-calculated values.
